subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Rollins, the spry shortstop who helped the Phillies rumble past the Mets and reach the playoffs for the first time in 14 years, edged Matt Holliday for M.V.P.
snippet: Jimmy Rollins, the spry shortstop who helped the Phillies rumble past the Mets and reach the playoffs for the first time in 14 years, edged Matt Holliday for M.V.P.
